metadata.name: uiforge-package
metadata.description: UIForge Node.js package template with MCP SDK and standard scripts
metadata.author: UIForge Contributors

package.json/uiforge-package@1.0.0.content:
{
  "name": "@uiforge/{project-name}",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "description": "UIForge project - {project-description}",
  "type": "module",
  "main": "./build/index.js",
  "bin": {
    "{project-name}": "./build/index.js"
  },
  "scripts": {
    "build": "tsc && node --input-type=module -e \"import fs from 'fs'; fs.chmodSync('build/index.js', 0o755)\"",
    "build:watch": "tsc --watch",
    "clean": "rimraf build/ node_modules/.cache/",
    "dev": "tsc --watch",
    "lint": "npm run lint:types && npm run lint:eslint && npm run lint:prettier",
    "lint:types": "tsc --noEmit",
    "lint:eslint": "eslint 'src/**/*.ts'",
    "lint:eslint:fix": "eslint 'src/**/*.ts' --fix",
    "lint:prettier": "prettier --check \"src/**/*.{ts,json}\"",
    "format": "prettier --write \"src/**/*.{ts,json}\" && eslint 'src/**/*.ts' --fix",
    "deps:check": "npm-check-updates",
    "deps:update": "npm-check-updates -u && npm install",
    "deps:update:interactive": "npm-check-updates -i",
    "test": "echo 'No tests configured yet'",
    "test:watch": "echo 'No tests configured yet'",
    "test:coverage": "echo 'No tests configured yet'",
    "prepare": "npm run build",
    "precommit": "npm run lint"
  },
  "files": [
    "build",
    "README.md",
    "LICENSE"
  ],
  "keywords": [
    "uiforge",
    "mcp",
    "model-context-protocol",
    "ai",
    "llm"
  ],
  "author": "UIForge Contributors",
  "license": "MIT",
  "repository": {
    "type": "git",
    "url": "https://github.com/LucasSantana-Dev/{project-repo}.git"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "@modelcontextprotocol/sdk": "^1.0.4",
    "node-fetch": "^3.3.2"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@types/node": "^22.10.5",
    "@typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin": "^8.55.0",
    "@typescript-eslint/parser": "^8.55.0",
    "eslint": "^9.18.0",
    "eslint-config-prettier": "^9.1.0",
    "eslint-import-resolver-typescript": "^3.7.0",
    "eslint-plugin-import": "^2.31.0",
    "npm-check-updates": "^17.1.14",
    "prettier": "^3.4.2",
    "rimraf": "^6.0.0",
    "typescript": "^5.7.3",
    "typescript-eslint": "^8.55.0"
  },
  "engines": {
    "node": ">=18.0.0"
  }
}

metadata.name: uiforge-python
metadata.description: UIForge Python project template with FastAPI and comprehensive tooling
metadata.author: UIForge Contributors

pyproject.toml/uiforge-python@1.0.0.content:
[build-system]
requires = ["setuptools>=61.0", "wheel"]
build-backend = "setuptools.build_meta"

[project]
name = "{project-name}"
version = "1.0.0"
description = "UIForge project - {project-description}"
authors = [
    {name = "UIForge Contributors", email = "contributors@uiforge.dev"}
]
license = {text = "MIT"}
readme = "README.md"
requires-python = ">=3.11"
classifiers = [
    "Development Status :: 4 - Beta",
    "Intended Audience :: Developers",
    "License :: OSI Approved :: MIT License",
    "Programming Language :: Python :: 3",
    "Programming Language :: Python :: 3.11",
    "Programming Language :: Python :: 3.12",
    "Programming Language :: Python :: 3.13",
]
keywords = ["uiforge", "mcp", "model-context-protocol", "ai", "llm"]

dependencies = [
    "fastapi>=0.104.0",
    "uvicorn[standard]>=0.24.0",
    "pydantic>=2.5.0",
    "pydantic-settings>=2.1.0",
    "httpx>=0.25.0",
    "structlog>=23.2.0",
]

[project.optional-dependencies]
dev = [
    "pytest>=7.4.0",
    "pytest-cov>=4.1.0",
    "pytest-asyncio>=0.21.0",
    "black>=23.10.0",
    "ruff>=0.1.0",
    "mypy>=1.7.0",
    "pre-commit>=3.5.0",
]
test = [
    "pytest>=7.4.0",
    "pytest-cov>=4.1.0",
    "pytest-asyncio>=0.21.0",
    "pytest-mock>=3.12.0",
    "httpx>=0.25.0",
]

[project.urls]
Homepage = "https://github.com/LucasSantana-Dev/{project-repo}"
Repository = "https://github.com/LucasSantana-Dev/{project-repo}"
Issues = "https://github.com/LucasSantana-Dev/{project-repo}/issues"

[project.scripts]
{project-name} = "{package_name}.main:main"

[tool.setuptools.packages.find]
where = ["src"]

[tool.setuptools.package-data]
{package_name} = ["py.typed"]

# Black configuration
[tool.black]
line-length = 88
target-version = ['py311', 'py312', 'py313']
include = '\.pyi?$'
extend-exclude = '''
/(
  # directories
  \.eggs
  | \.git
  | \.hg
  | \.mypy_cache
  | \.tox
  | \.venv
  | build
  | dist
)/
'''

# Ruff configuration
[tool.ruff]
line-length = 88
target-version = "py311"
select = [
    "E",   # pycodestyle errors
    "W",   # pycodestyle warnings
    "F",   # pyflakes
    "I",   # isort
    "B",   # flake8-bugbear
    "C4",  # flake8-comprehensions
    "UP",  # pyupgrade
    "ARG", # flake8-unused-arguments
    "SIM", # flake8-simplify
    "TCH", # flake8-type-checking
]
ignore = [
    "E501",  # line too long, handled by black
    "B008",  # do not perform function calls in argument defaults
    "TCH001", # typing-only import in non-typing context
]

[tool.ruff.per-file-ignores]
"__init__.py" = ["F401"]
"tests/**" = ["ARG", "S"]

[tool.ruff.format]
quote-style = "double"
indent-style = "space"

# MyPy configuration
[tool.mypy]
python_version = "3.11"
warn_return_any = true
warn_unused_configs = true
disallow_untyped_defs = true
disallow_incomplete_defs = true
check_untyped_defs = true
disallow_untyped_decorators = true
no_implicit_optional = true
warn_redundant_casts = true
warn_unused_ignores = true
warn_no_return = true
warn_unreachable = true
strict_equality = true

[[tool.mypy.overrides]]
module = [
    "uvicorn.*",
    "structlog.*",
]
ignore_missing_imports = true

# Pytest configuration
[tool.pytest.ini_options]
minversion = "6.0"
addopts = "-ra -q --strict-markers --cov={package_name} --cov-report=xml --cov-report=html --cov-report=term-missing --cov-fail-under=80"
testpaths = ["tests"]
python_files = ["test_*.py", "*_test.py"]
python_classes = ["Test*"]
python_functions = ["test_*"]
markers = [
    "slow: marks tests as slow (deselect with '-m \"not slow\"')",
    "integration: marks tests as integration tests",
    "unit: marks tests as unit tests",
    "api: marks tests as API tests",
    "database: marks tests as database tests",
    "security: marks tests as security tests",
]

# Coverage configuration
[tool.coverage.run]
source = ["src"]
omit = [
    "*/tests/*",
    "*/test_*",
    "*/__pycache__/*",
    "*/migrations/*",
]

[tool.coverage.report]
exclude_lines = [
    "pragma: no cover",
    "def __repr__",
    "if self.debug:",
    "if settings.DEBUG",
    "raise AssertionError",
    "raise NotImplementedError",
    "if 0:",
    "if __name__ == .__main__.:",
    "class .*\\bProtocol\\):",
    "@(abc\\.)?abstractmethod",
]
show_missing = true
precision = 2
fail_under = 80

[tool.coverage.html]
directory = "htmlcov"

metadata.name: uiforge-typescript
metadata.description: UIForge TypeScript configuration with strict mode and path mappings
metadata.author: UIForge Contributors

tsconfig.json/uiforge-typescript@1.0.0.content:
{
  "compilerOptions": {
    "target": "ES2022",
    "module": "Node16",
    "moduleResolution": "node",
    "lib": ["ES2022"],
    "outDir": "./build",
    "rootDir": "./src",
    "strict": true,
    "esModuleInterop": true,
    "skipLibCheck": true,
    "forceConsistentCasingInFileNames": true,
    "declaration": true,
    "declarationMap": true,
    "sourceMap": true,
    "removeComments": false,
    "noImplicitAny": true,
    "noImplicitReturns": true,
    "noImplicitThis": true,
    "noUnusedLocals": true,
    "noUnusedParameters": true,
    "exactOptionalPropertyTypes": true,
    "noImplicitOverride": true,
    "noPropertyAccessFromIndexSignature": true,
    "noUncheckedIndexedAccess": true,
    "allowUnusedLabels": false,
    "allowUnreachableCode": false,
    "resolveJsonModule": true,
    "isolatedModules": true,
    "verbatimModuleSyntax": false,
    "allowSyntheticDefaultImports": true,
    "experimentalDecorators": true,
    "emitDecoratorMetadata": true,
    "baseUrl": "./src",
    "paths": {
      "@/*": ["*"],
      "@/types/*": ["types/*"],
      "@/utils/*": ["utils/*"],
      "@/config/*": ["config/*"],
      "@/services/*": ["services/*"],
      "@/middleware/*": ["middleware/*"],
      "@/routes/*": ["routes/*"],
      "@/controllers/*": ["controllers/*"],
      "@/models/*": ["models/*"],
      "@/tests/*": ["tests/*"]
    }
  },
  "include": [
    "src/**/*",
    "types/**/*"
  ],
  "exclude": [
    "node_modules",
    "build",
    "dist",
    "**/*.test.ts",
    "**/*.spec.ts",
    "**/node_modules/**",
    "**/build/**",
    "**/dist/**"
  ],
  "ts-node": {
    "esm": true,
    "experimentalSpecifierResolution": "node"
  }
}
